definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Boolean" id="found">found</variable><variable type="Number" id="energy">energy</variable><variable type="Number" id="sx">sx</variable><variable type="Number" id="sy">sy</variable><variable type="Number" id="sz">sz</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="68" w="294">This example will test if the current entity type is the player. If it is true, then it will run whatever you place in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="69" w="245">This tests if the difficulty is not peaceful if the condition is true. It will then strike lighting at the current cords.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_checkdifficulty"><field name="difficulty">PEACEFUL</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="strike_lightning"><field name="effectOnly">FALSE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
